bibl.idno: The Philip S. Hench Walter Reed/Yellow Fever Collection [manuscript] / [collected by] Philip S. Hench ; HEALTHSCI MS-1.

bibl.title: Letter from the Gibson Bros. to George A. Jones, April 26, 1901

div1.p: Gibson Bros. informs Jones that the cost for “The Etiology of Yellow Fever” pamphlets will be $46.00.

div1.head: Letter from the Gibson Bros. to George A. Jones, April 26, 1901
div1.opener:
BROTHERS
ND BOOKBINDERS
NSYLVANIA AVENUE
Cor. 13TH STREET
=====
Washington, D.C. Apl. 26, 1901.
Mr. Geo. Jones,
Chief Clerk, Surgeon General's Office.
Dear Sir:
div1.p:
We estimate 300 copies of the
little pamplet-“The Etiology of Yellow Fever”-
including the cost of reproducing the 6
diagrams ($15,00)-- worth $46.00.
